description: Intended to address the University's global community objectives and provide scholarly background on human development in other cultures.
Intended to address the University's global community objectives and provide scholarly background on India for Schreyer Honors students.
Creative projects, including research and design, which are supervised on an individual basis and which fall outside the scope of formal courses.
Formal courses given infrequently to explore, in depth, a comparatively narrow subject which may be topical or of special interest.
